definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: Hardly does he make spelling mistakes.
The composition is very well written, saving that there are a few spelling mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 除了幾個拼寫錯誤外，這篇作文寫得很好。

sentences.english: The article is well written except that there are a few mis-spellings.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章寫得不錯，只是有幾個拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: His composition teems with spelling mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他的作文有大量的拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: So what does a piece littered with misspellings tell a reader?
sentences.chinese: 一張帶滿拼寫錯誤的廢紙，能告訴讀者什麼呢？

sentences.english: Marry ofter winks at the spelling mistakes in her homework.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗常常對她作業裏的拼寫錯誤睜一眼閉一眼。

sentences.english: Well, you see iron. But this is misspelled.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，你看到了鐵，但它拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: She made fewer spelling mistakes than before.
sentences.chinese: 她現在的拼寫錯誤比以前少了。

sentences.english: He tends to make spelling mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他動不動就犯拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: Added the ability for Aspell to learn form the users misspellings.
sentences.chinese: 增加從用戶拼寫錯誤中學習功能。

sentences.english: The teacher circled the spelling mistakes in red ink.
sentences.chinese: 老師用紅筆把拼寫錯誤圈了起來。

sentences.english: Not just a word predictor! Typ-O knows how you misspell words. This is how it finds the right words for even your worst typos.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅是一款文字預測器還可以糾正你的拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: Correct my spelling if it's wrong.
sentences.chinese: 如有拼寫錯誤，請予改正。

sentences.english: Too many grammar and spelling mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 太多的語法和拼寫錯誤。

sentences.english: Your composition is good except for some mispellings.
sentences.chinese: 除了幾個拼寫錯誤以外，你的作文寫得不錯。

sentences.english: The teacher looked over his spelling faults.
sentences.chinese: 教師原諒了他的拼寫錯誤。
